entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
